name: Balls Road - Perfect Gate Run
description:
This is a simple yet addicting game that will certainly challenge your skills and reflexes!
The concept of the game is simple. Tap to juggle the two twin balls along the way and try to avoid all the deadly obstacles.

MAIN FEATURES:

- Cool, addictive one-touch gameplay.
- Collect coins to unlock 30 different balls.
- Amazing music and intense sound effects
- Simple yet interestingly challenging.

Have fun and leave feedback for any features that you would like to be added.
